info.author: Julian Comanean
info.description:
utphy theme
===========

This is a wagtail app for theme switching
It can be extended to switch as many themes as you need.

Dependencies
------------

- wagtail_
- wagtailmenus_
- wagtail-themes_

.. _wagtail: https://wagtail.io
.. _wagtailmenus: https://github.com/rkhleics/wagtailmenus
.. _wagtail-themes: https://github.com/moorinteractive/wagtail-themes

Quick Start
-----------
Install from pypy::

    pip install wagtail-utphy-themes

Edit base.py

* follow the instructions to configure wagtailmenus_
* follow the instructions to configure wagtail-themes_

* add "utphy_themes" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting::

    INSTALLED_APPS = [
        ...
        'utphy_themes',
    ]

* add link to the utphy_themes app dir::

    from utphy_themes import UTPHY_TEMPLATES_APP_DIR

change the "DIRS" entry in TEMPLATES to list the utph_apps templates::

    TEMPLATES = [
        {
            'BACKEND': 'django.template.backends.django.DjangoTemplates',
            'APP_DIRS': False,
            'DIRS': [
                os.path.join(UTPHY_TEMPLATES_APP_DIR, 'templates'),
                os.path.join(BASE_DIR, 'templates'),
                ],
            'OPTIONS': [
                ...
                ]

add the following config entries in 'base.py', somewhere at the end of the file::

    # Wagtail themes config
    WAGTAIL_THEME_PATH = 'utphy_themes'
    WAGTAIL_THEMES = [
        ('foundation', 'UTPHY Foundation'),
        ('utphy_www', 'UTPHY Website'),
        ]



NOTE to developers
------------------
When pushing to remote devpi repository, if you don't add the --no-vcs option it
 will not push ignored files. To avoid this, push the repo like this::

    devpi upload --no-vcs
info.name: wagtail-utphy-themes
info.summary: A Wagtail theme switcher for the Physics Department at the UofT.
